46#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
47#include "am_bsp.h"
48#include "am_util.h"
49
50#define USE_SPI 1 // 0 = I2C, 1 = SPI
51#define I2C_ADDR 0x10
52
53#define XOR_BYTE 0
54#define EMPTY_BYTE 0xEE
55
56#define AM_IOSTEST_IOSTOIOM_DATAAVAIL_INTMASK 1
57
58//*****************************************************************************
59//
60// Configure GPIOs for communicating with a SPI device
61// This should ideally come from BSP to keep the code portable
62//
63//*****************************************************************************
64#define ENABLE_DMA 1
65
66//
67// Apollo510 IOSFD does not support I2C
68//
69#if defined(AM_PART_APOLLO510) && (USE_SPI == 0)
70#undef TEST_IOS_MODULE
71#define TEST_IOS_MODULE 0
72#undef SLINT_GPIO
73#define SLINT_GPIO 1
74#undef lram_array
75#define lram_array am_hal_ios_pui8LRAM
76#undef IOS_ACC_IRQ
77#define IOS_ACC_IRQ IOSLAVEACC_IRQn
78#undef IOS_IRQ
79#define IOS_IRQ IOSLAVE_IRQn
80#undef ios_isr
81#define ios_isr am_ioslave_ios_isr
82#undef ios_acc_isr
83#define ios_acc_isr am_ioslave_acc_isr
84#undef SLINT_FUN_SEL
85#define SLINT_FUN_SEL AM_HAL_PIN_4_GPIO
86#undef AM_BSP_GPIO_TEST_IOS_SCK
87#define AM_BSP_GPIO_TEST_IOS_SCK AM_BSP_GPIO_IOS_SCL
88#undef AM_BSP_GPIO_TEST_IOS_MOSI
89#define AM_BSP_GPIO_TEST_IOS_MOSI AM_BSP_GPIO_IOS_SDA
90#endif
91
92#define HANDSHAKE_PIN 4
93
94typedef enum
95{
96 AM_IOSTEST_CMD_START_DATA = 0xF0,
97 AM_IOSTEST_CMD_STOP_DATA = 0xF1,
98 AM_IOSTEST_CMD_ACK_DATA = 0xF2,
99} AM_IOSTEST_CMD_E;
